trends: There have been 82 other sightings in Cincinnati
There were no other sightings in Cincinnati on or around November 15th 1977
Summary: Cigar shape, no wings with conical tail gear. Size of commercial air-liner.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: sighting detailsi was driving home from work (second shift off at 11 ish) and with few cars on the road i happened to look up out of the windshield of my auto and saw what looked like a commercial aircraft zoo close to the ground i thought it was gonna crash. i stopped my car when i realized that it was simply hovering in place then pulled into the parking \ play lot of the grade school, turned off my engine and got out to look up at it. i was a grey cigar shaped craft and i was struck that it didn't have wings and it occurred to me that it was not possible for something so large and no sound to just hang there over head. i stood under it looking up for a few minutes and it slowly began moving in a lazy movement and turned on a dime a one point. i was not fearful but amazed at this. it moved less than 1 mph away from me and i watched it till it went past the roof tops of the neighborhood houses. i got back in my car and drove home. this happened in cincinnati, ohio in front of a catholic grade school, st. aloysius gonzaga on the west side of cincinnati. 4390 bridgetown road, 45211 this is not the only unexplained object i have see and will be happy to share all as long as it is taken serious.
